about_page.decription_1: The platform was launched in October 2016.
about_page.decription_2: Originally the blockchain Golos was created with STEEM.inc license for the Russian-speaking community. By the development process and new different innovations now Golos.io is a project with its structure, economy and rules, the geography of which is constantly expanding.
about_page.header: Golos.io is a media platform built on blockchain Golos.

golos_gp.hint: Delegation - transfer some amount of your Golos Power to other users account. Delegation can be canceled at any time.

golos_gp.tip_2: Golos Power cannot be transferred to other users, but you can delegate it
golos_gp.tip_3: The amount of Golos Power increases during storage.
golos_gp.title: Golos ‚Üí Golos Power

gp_golos.per_week: Payments will be about %(amount)s GOLOS per week.
gp_golos.tip_1: Transfer Golos Power into Golos tokens to get a more liquid token that can be moved between users. At the same time, you reduce your voting power. The conversion takes 13 weeks.
gp_golos.title: Golos Power ‚Üí Golos

userkeys_jsx.the_private_key_or_password_should_be_ke: The private key or password for the owner key should be kept offline as much as possible.

technical_work.start: We launched all mail services of golos.io on CyberWay!
technical_work.bags: However, using this site now you might find some bugs.
technical_work.want: Please, help us and report all found errors and bugs to our support team via %(channel)s, and %(tasks)s
technical_work.thanks: Thank you for your understanding and support!
technical_work.text:
Dear CyberWay users and validators!

Errors related to the functioning of the Cyberway Blockchain have been resolved, we ask validators to update the node to version 2.0.1.
At the moment, we are engaged in the restoration of services.

Thank you for your understanding and support!
Yours, Golos Team
technical_work.text_pause: Due to technical problems, the site has been suspended.

reset_key.delay_warning: Your account has owner key restriction. Password can be changed only with time delay in %(delay)s days.

Changes will be reset.

contracts.publish: The smart contract golos.publication provides work with posts, including the ability for users to perform the following actions: publish posts, leave comments, vote for posts and close posts, and also provides payment of remuneration to post authors.
contracts.ctrl: The smart contract golos.ctrl contains the logic for selecting leaders, including the procedure for registering an account as a leader, the procedure for voting for a leader, as well as determining the list of the most rated leaders.
contracts.referral: The golos.referral smart contract contains the logic of the referral program, which provides for the reward of users who invited their friends or third parties to register in the Voice application through social networks (for example, by viewing publications of third-party authors or by posting their own posts on the blockchain). The logic of the referral program defines one user as a referrer in relation to another (referral). The smart contract contains an algorithm for calculating the remuneration for the post, as well as an algorithm for terminating the action of the referral program, including completion at the initiative of the referral user through the purchase of his account.
contracts.emit: The smart contract golos.emit ensures the generation of new tokens and their distribution over the reward pools in accordance with its settings - the set parameter values.
contracts.vesting: The smart contract golos.vesting provides binding of the vest to the token created by the cyber.token smart contract.
contracts.charge: The smart contract golos.charge performs an application function - it allows you to limit the activity of users in creating posts, comments, and also in voting for posts. Direct interaction of the user with the golos.charge smart contact does not occur, access to operations-actions occurs through the smart publishing contract.
